question: Hello, my name is Anna. I'm going to ask you a few questions. Just let me know when you're ready to get started.
Is there anything that you need immediately (such as food, car repair, housing, financial assistance, etc)?
What is your legal name, first and last?
How old are you?
What state are you located in?
How did you find us?
Why did you contact us?
What gender do you identify as?
Do you identify as trans?
What is your sexual orientation?
What is your race?
Are you married or have you ever been married?
Do you have any children? If so, how many?
What is the highest level of education you have?
Are you employed?
Approximately how much do you make in a year?
Have you ever been homeless?
Are you currently homeless?
What is your housing status? (own a house, rent an apartment, lease, etc.)
What is your mailing address?
Are you a military veteran? If so, which branch?
Have you ever worked for the federal, state, and/or local government? If so, which department?
Have you ever been arrested or convicted of a crime?
Have you ever been the victim of a crime?
Have you used government services before? If so which ones?
Do you have any outstanding debts, including things like student loans or credit card debts? Approximately how much do you owe?
Have you applied for aid from non-profit groups before?
What are your clothing sizes?
Thanks, that's all the questions I have. I really appreciate your help!
